title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The bug report does not provide any observed behavior.
EB: The BidiUtil class should have a private constructor. As there are no nonstatic methods in this class, it is unnecessary to allow instantiation. Adding a private constructor would prevent people from inadvertently creating instances. This change would not increase the size of the class, as the compiler automatically generates a public constructor. Instead, it would make the constructor private and prevent unnecessary instantiation.
SR:
1. Locate the BidiUtil class in the win32 module.
2. Verify that the class currently has a public constructor.
3. Add a private constructor to the BidiUtil class.
4. Build and test the project to ensure the changes are integrated properly.
